name: Color Slayer
description:
Race and slash your way forward in this color-based arcade game.
Push your reflexes as you evade or slice color-coded enemies.



Use the right colored sword to slash enemies as you avoid shielded ones, and pick the right enemy after a color switcher.
Quickly dispatch enemies to make a combo chain, and cut through bomb enemies gains higher points.
Earn points to unlock extra costumes.
